channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Vehicle has been parked in this position for 2 months, 19th February
item.description:
Car has been here and been driven last week, then parked in the same spot again, this car has not been MOTd and is being driven illegally.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lucas Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parkside there is a dip across the road, 19th February
item.description:
There is a dip across the road near no 72 Parkside road, this is causing traffic to slow down to avoid damaging their vehicles The matter requires some serious planning to resolve the issue and ensure that the road is safe
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parkside Avenue, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gravel hill near the bus stop pothole, 19th February

item.title: 20 inch pothole near the traffic lights on Bury Street near the A10, 19th February
item.description:
There is a big deep pothole near the traffic lights down Bury Street the A10 traffic lights. There are two lanes at the lights you have to go up on the curb to miss the pothole very dangerous for drivers and pedestrians. Please could it be repaired as soon as possible. Thank you.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bury Street, Edmonton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A2 black prince fly over poor roads surface, 19th February
item.description:
The flyover at the black prince A2 requires attention again as there is a poor road surface the temporary fix’s is only lasting at least two weeks, there needs to a plan to have the surface repairs and not short term repairs
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bourne Road, Bexley, Greater London
